title: Re-slot a High-Velocity Item
description: An item's sales have increased, and a warehouse manager wants to move it to a forward picking location closer to the packing stations to reduce travel time.

tasks.description: Run an inventory velocity report to identify the fastest-moving items.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies a product that has become a top-10 seller.

tasks.description: Find an empty or suitable pick location in the 'Gold Zone' near the outbound area.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies an available, appropriately sized location.

tasks.description: Create and assign a task for an operator to move the item from its current location to the new, optimized location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a replenishment/move task to the new location.
